colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @020B (ZHES DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED KYI SGRUB THABS BSDUS PA NYON MONGS MUN SEL NAM MKHA'I NOR BU ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, STOBS KYI 'KHOR LOS BSGYUR BA CHING GIS RGYAL PO'I GDUNG RGYUD DU 'KHRUNGS SHING DANG STOBS DANG LDAN PA GSUNG RAB DBANG GIS SRAS BU DPON PO DPAL LDAN DANG, SHIS RAB DANG DPA' RTSAL DANG STOBS DANG LDAN PA DPN PO NOR BU BSTAN 'DZIN DANG, GZHAN YANG DON GNYER CAN MANG POS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, LHA'I BTZUN PA SU MA TI MA NI DRADZNY'AS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI SANGHA BHA DRA'O, 'DIS KYANG KUN MKHYEN RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA SPYI DANG, KHYAD PAR @021A *, ,DU YANG KHAMS GSUM CHOS KYI RGYAL PO BTZONG KHA PA CHEN PO'I MDO SNGAGS KYI BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PA DANG, 'GRO KUN 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS KYI GO 'PHANG MYUR DU 'THOB PAR GYUR CIG ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
author_simple: SU MA TI MA NI DRADZNY'A,
